item.description: dinner at Butterfly's (chinese) at 5pm....located at 831 Farmington ave West Hartford Ct...check the menu  http://www.butterflyrestaurantct.com/main-menu/menu2-444   then the Carriage House Theater 360 Farmington Ave Hartford Ct for the play......( play at 730 PM )                          HartBeat Ensemble Presents: (Riding The Turnpike )..... Riding the Turnpike is set in a strip club on the Connecticut Berlin Turnpike in which four women are involved in prostitution in different ways and for different reasons. The lines between who is trafficked, who is there of their own free will and who is there for survival, are blurred as we watch the women navigate their own disparate situation, each more complex than the next. The play looks at what makes certain women and girls targets and examines all that one person can and will do to survive and secure their needs. Riding the Turnpike was inspired by the book, nThe Berlin Turnpike: A True Story of Human Trafficking in America, written by Raymond Bechard website....tickets are 16.52 (seniors )..21.62 otherwise....you can buy your tickets online at hartbeatensemble.org.....or call 860-548-9144.....this is a 77 seat theater....time to have fun....

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: DINNER AND LOCAL THEATER MAY 18 5PM
